name: Inside the planet
description:
*Note: It takes a couple seconds to load, the initial black screen is normal Moku sad.

Moku want to explore but Moku are small, small, small… and only know to run. But they are much faster than their friends! So they decide to run until something happens.

Someday, they pick up a shiny yellow ball and… uuuooooooohhhh!!! They are flying! New worlds! New things…. and spiky things? Moku think better not touch them.

Help Moku and travel all the small worlds. In order to that you only have to do one thing…

Note: It takes a couple seconds to load, the initial black screen is normal

Jump.

Press Space or left mouse button to help Moku jump obstacles, dodge enemies and get the shiny yellow ball to be able to travel to other worlds!

Developers:

  • Victor Reiner: Programmer, Music and SFX. (https://twitter.com/victor_reiner)
  • Shubi_Art: Artist and Level Designer. (https://twitter.com/Shubi_Art)
  • Bobemv: Programmer. (https://twitter.com/bobemv)
